R

raft - package raft
Implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm
RaftInterface - Interface in raft
RaftInterface -- this is the "service interface" that is implemented by each Raft peer using the remote library from Lab 1.
RaftPeer - Class in raft
RaftPeer class represents a Raft peer node that interacts with others using remote calls -- each RaftPeer supports a Service interface to accept incoming remote calls per RaftInterface -- each RaftPeer holds a list of stub interfaces to request remote calls per RaftInferface -- all remote calls are implemented using the underlying remote object library
RaftPeer(int, int, int) - Constructor for class raft.RaftPeer
Constructor for RaftPeer
RaftPeer.State - Enum Class in raft
RaftPeer states
random - Variable in class raft.RaftPeer
A random number generator for election timing and other randomness.
reader - Variable in class remote.LeakySocket
 
recvObject() - Method in class remote.LeakySocket
The recvObject() method will block the open socket until a Java object is received.
remote - package remote
 
remoteInterface - Variable in class remote.StubInvocationHandler
 
RemoteObjectException - Exception Class in remote
A custom exception that is used to indicate that a method implementation involves invocation of a method on a remote object over a network connection.
RemoteObjectException(String) - Constructor for exception class remote.RemoteObjectException
Creates a RemoteObjectException with the given message string.
RemoteObjectException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception class remote.RemoteObjectException
Creates a RemoteObjectException with a message string and the given cause.
RemoteObjectException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception class remote.RemoteObjectException
Creates a RemoteObjectException from the given cause.

The service abstraction for network communication.
Service<T> - Class in remote
Remote Object Service
Service(Class<T>, T, int) - Constructor for class remote.Service
The first constructor creates a Service that is bound to a given remote interface, instantiated object, and server port number.
Service(Class<T>, T, int, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class remote.Service
The second constructor creates a Service similar to the first one, but with additional parameters to enable simulated loss and/or delay of Objects being sent over network Sockets.
service_error(RemoteObjectException) - Method in class remote.Service
When an exception occurs in a service thread, service_error is called, similar to previous.
Service.ServiceThread - Class in remote
Constructs a new service thread to handle individual client connections.

serviceObject - Variable in class remote.Service.ServiceThread

Constructs a new service thread.
setDelay(boolean, int, int) - Method in class remote.LeakySocket
The setDelay() method allows for changing the boolean delayed parameter and the corresponding sleep duration (which includes both a component in milliseconds and in microseconds since both parameters are supported by Thread.sleep).
setLossRate(boolean, double) - Method in class remote.LeakySocket
The setLossRate() method allows for changing the boolean lossy parameter and the corresponding probability that each Object will be dropped.
setTimeout(int, int) - Method in class remote.LeakySocket
The setTimeout() method allows for changing the timeout duration incurred when a packet is lost, again including both milli- and micro-second components.
